screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint if self.timerRunning: titleheight = 60 else: titleheight = 0 self.setTitle("") orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 152, textsize[1] + 60) wsizex = textsize[0] + 180 wsizey = textsize[1] lenlist = len(self.list)*76 if (lenlist > 760): lenlist = 760 if (192 > wsizey): wsizey = 192 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += lenlist + 60 if (840 > wsizex): wsizex = 840 listwidth = self.getListWidth() + 20 if (listwidth > 2560): listwidth = 2560 if (listwidth > wsizex): wsizex = listwidth wsize = (wsizex, wsizey + titleheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(194, 24 + titleheight)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(14, 14 + titleheight)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(160,160)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(14, 14 + titleheight)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(160,160)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(14, 14 + titleheight)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(160,160)) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (wsizex-12, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(6, wsizey - lenlist + titleheight - 6)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey)/2))
